title: Matching Subjects and Verbs
subject: Grammar
objective: Students will match singular and plural subjects with the correct present-tense verbs.

lessonFlow.content: Verbs must match the subject of the sentence. Let's learn how!

rules.rule: If the subject is one person/thing, the verb usually ends in -s.
If the subject is more than one, use the base verb.

activities.question: Which sentence is correct?
activities.explanation: Plural subjects use the base form of the verb.

lessonFlow.instruction: Write a sentence using a singular subject and verb that ends in -s.

lessonFlow.message: You're great at matching subjects and verbs!
